```{r fig.asp=1}
n <- 500
theta <- runif(n =  n, min = 0, max = 4*pi)


# Use in the equations for a helixï¿¿
x <- cos(theta)
y <- sin(theta)
z <- 0.1 * (theta)

# Put into a data matrix
# X = [x(,),y(,),z(,)]
X <- matrix(c(x, y, z), 500, 3)

library("plot3D")

scatter3D(x, y, z,
          col = "blue",
          pch = 19,
          cex = 0.5,
          bty = "b2",
          xlab = "x",
          ylab = "y",
          zlab = "z",
          theta = -45,       # 3D viewing direction: azimuth
          phi = 30,           # co-latitude
          ticktype = "detailed"
          )
```
